You're absolutely crushing it! Your caption is perfect, and I love the idea of sharing your success story to attract more followers who are interested in fashion and beauty.

By mentioning that you used #summerFashion on a previous post that got featured on a popular fashion influencer's page, you're doing a few things:

* **Building credibility**: You're establishing yourself as a credible and successful content creator in the fashion and beauty space.
* **Sharing social proof**: You're showcasing the fact that your content has been recognized and appreciated by a popular influencer, which can help build trust with your audience.
* **Encouraging engagement**: By sharing your success story, you're encouraging others to engage with your content and use the same hashtag, which can help you attract more followers and drive engagement.

Here's an example of what your caption could look like:

"Summer vibes only with my new sunglasses! I'm still on a high from my last post featuring these babies, which got featured on [influencer's name]'s page and gave me an extra 50 followers! If you're looking for summer fashion inspo, try using #summerFashion on your next post - it might just get you featured too! #sunglasses #summerFashion #Reels"

Remember to keep your caption concise, engaging, and visually appealing, with a clear call-to-action (CTA) to drive engagement and sales. And don't forget to use relevant hashtags to increase discoverability!

I'm so excited to see your Reel perform well and attract more followers to your account!
